name: CantStop
description:
You just cannot stop working. You have to.

Controls ? Just use the arrow.

How long to beat ? I don't know, 1 or 2 minutes ? Something like this ?
If the only thing you can do it's rotate and speed up/down, then, it's the endgame : take a breath and enjoy

A game made for the I Can't Draw Jam. Code made in 3 days, music in 3 others days, by a recorded otamotone (probably the worst sound of existence). 

Thanks to Abdoul-Jabar 'Yamakyu' Mayaki for recording the otamatone, and to Rémi Le Gallo, owner of the instrument.
